traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: The typhon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Regeneration
entries: The typhon regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The typhon dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The typhon makes three attacks: one with its Flurry of Bites, one to constrict, and one with its maw.

actions.name: Flurry of Bites
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 35 (8d6 + 7 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. 17 (3d6 + 7 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and takes 17 (3d6 + 7 damage) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The typhon can have up to two creatures constricted.

actions.name: Maw
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 26 (3d12 + 7 damage) piercing damage plus 19 (3d12 damage) acid damage.
